Title: Casket with Design of Horsemen
Description: This casket features an silver inlaid design of horsemen (possibly falconers) within roundels.
Provenance: Dikran Kelekian, New York and Paris; Henry Walters, Baltimore, 1928, by purchase; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian
Images: PS1_54.519_3Qtr_DD_T16-tms.jpg, PS1_54.519_3QtrLft_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.519_3QtrRt_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.519_Back_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.519_Back_DD_T16-tms.jpg, PS1_54.519_Fnt_DD_T09.jpg, PS1_54.519_Fnt_DD_T16-tms.jpg, PS1_54.519_Lft_DD_T16-tms.jpg, PS1_54.519_Lf
